item.description: 各语言打包举例 Golang FROMgolang:1.12.17 AS build-env ADD . /go/src/gitlab.com/tcitry/gogogo WORKDIR/go/src/gitlab.com/tcitry/gogogo RUN go build -o /build/gogogo main.go FROMgolang:1.12.17 COPY --from=build-env /build/gogogo /data/src/ COPY conf/test.toml /data/src/ COPY entrypoint.sh /data/src/ EXPOSE5555 ENTRYPOINT ["/data/src/entrypoint.sh"] #!/bin/sh mv test.toml config.toml if [ -z $COMMAND ]; then if [ ! -z $1 ] ; then COMMAND=$@ fi exec /data/src/gogogo $COMMAND else exec /data/src/gogogo $COMMAND fi Python FROMpython:3.6 WORKDIR/data/src COPY ./requirements.txt /data/src/requirements.txt RUN
